import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tasks', templateUrl: './tasks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tasks.component.css'] }) export class TasksComponent { tasks = [ { id: 1, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium, rerum! Provident rerum velit reiciendis, architecto nesciunt minima. Amet, dolor nam.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-pink.png", checkbox:true }, { id: 2, title: "Study Well", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicin", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-blue.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 3, title: "Clean yourself", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-red.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 4, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-red.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 5, title: "work hard ", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-green.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 6, title: "be honest", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium, rerum! Provident rerum velit reiciendis, architecto nesciunt minima. Amet, dolor nam.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-blue.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 7, title: "to write book", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-red.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 8, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-red.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 9, title: "my name", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium, rerum! Provident rerum velit reiciendis, architecto nesciunt minima. Amet, dolor nam.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-blue.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 10, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium, rerum! Provident rerum velit reiciendis, architecto nesciunt minima. Amet, dolor nam.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-pink.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 11, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-blue.png", checkbox: false }, { id: 12, title: "Fetch Water", menu: "assets/more.png", description: "Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.", type: "assets/icons8-filled-circle-green.png", checkbox: false }, ] deleteTask(d:HTMLParagraphElement){ let id:any = d.id; for (let i = 0; i < this.tasks.length; i++) { if (this.tasks[i].id === (id-1)) { console.log(this.tasks[i].id); this.tasks.splice(i, 1); console.log(i); // remove the element at index i break; // exit the loop once the element is removed } } } edit:any; editMenu(d:HTMLImageElement) { let id:any = d.id console.log(id); this.tasks.forEach(e=>{ if(e.id == id){ return this.edit = id } }) } barValue:any; editbar(d:HTMLParagraphElement){ let id :any = d.id this.barValue = id; } displayValue: string = '' navValueSearch(d: string) { this.displayValue = d console.log(d); } taskValue: string = '' searchtaskValue(d: string) { this.taskValue = d; } radiovalue:boolean = false sendRadioValue(d:HTMLInputElement) { let id = d.value; let select = d.checked; // this.tasks = this.tasks.map((e)=>{ // if(e.id == id){ // e.checkbox = select; // } // return e; // }); // console.log(this .tasks); } hidetask(d:boolean){ if(d){ this.tasks = this.tasks.filter(task => task.checkbox !== true); }else{ this.tasks } } }
